column4: On second thought, I guess I will ask here.  Not a lot of tech support talk atm.  How long is it usually before a .1 release on an LTS?
Mostly because I want latest Ubuntu, but without the 10.04 bugs...
I can only think of once  befor . that i even saw a .1 release.. that was like several months. (year+?) after the release.
im not sure there is a set specific time/sxhedule
